channel.title: Fate of the Faerie Queen
channel.description:
On the Gauntlet Blog ﻿@Sandy provides a complete new framework for *Fate of Cthulhu* from Evil Hat﻿﻿ -- with time-travelling heroes trying to stop a world of fey domination. Shane lays out the set up and briefing as well as walking through how her recent campaign run of this went.
Check that out here: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/fate-of-the-faerie-queen
Index for The Gauntlet Blog: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog-table-of-contents.html
